code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"../styles/library.css";import{useNavigate,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function EditBook(){const{id}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[author,setAuthor]=useState("");const[year,setYear]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const fetchBook=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:5000/books/".concat(id));setTitle(res.data.title);setAuthor(res.data.author);setYear(res.data.year);}catch(err){console.error("Eroare la preluarea cărții:",err);alert("Nu s-a putut încărca cartea.
